text: 2 references. public async Task<List<T>> ExecuteQueryAsync<T>(string dbName, string query, DynamicParameters parameters = null) { try { var cnn = GetConnection(dbName); if (enn == null) return new List<T>(); if (parameters == null) return cnn.QueryAsync<T>(query).Result.AsList(); return cnn.Query<T>(query, parameters).AsList(); } catch (Exception ex) { throw new Exception(query, ex); } }
